title: Game wont let me load in until it starts
body: I have been having this issue for about a month. I can log in, queue up, and get through champ select no problem, but while loading in usually somewhere between 50 and 60 percent i stop loading and get a message saying i need to relaunch. If i relaunch too quickly i only get a black screen and can never get into the game but if i wait until the game actually starts i can get in every time. It is frustrating because it makes me miss the first wave and puts me at a huge disadvantage. I've tried reinstalling but that didn't fix anything. It only happens when I'm at my mother's house. It doesn't happen if I use a different computer as well. Any help would be greatly appreciated

replies.body: You might have a connection problem holding onto the game server, and getting cut off.  The black screen further affirms that as it can't download assets.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get in-game, and test it out in customs.  Let me know if you have any questions!
